name: WDT World Defense Tower
description:
In WDT World Defense Tower, mysterious alien portals are appearing throughout the world. You are tasked with building a series of defense towers to protect against any imminent alien invasion across different regional zones.

Exciting features:
● INTENSE NON-STOP 3D ACTION over 36 maps within 4 different regions
● DRAG & PINCH ZOOM IN/OUT of maps during gameplay, even when paused
● NON-LINEAR PATHING for all 8 different types of enemy aliens
● BUILD YOUR TOWERS ANYWHERE including your main starting base
● STRATEGICALLY DEPLOY 7 unique defense tower types during missions
● NO WAITING AROUND with instant tower building, upgrading and selling
● IMPROVE MAXIMUM UPGRADES for all defense towers and their ammo types
● UNLOCK & STOCK UP on freeze, virus and EMP specials defense attacks

Increased strategy:
● All defense towers require a power source, so choosing a strategic starting location as well as planning where to build additional power towers becomes essential
● WDT missile defense towers can actually attack ground & air-based aliens
● No direct paths for air-based aliens means they still need to navigate around tall structures & towers
